PlaceMineDown - arena.core.Action
The agent places a mine below itself.

The agent places a mine to the right of itself.

Returns an action that places a mine towards the specified location.
PlaceMineUp - arena.core.Action
The agent places a mine above itself.
Player - arena.core.GameState.EntityType
The entity is a AI-controlled player that interacts with the environment by moving, shooting, and placing mines.
PlayerAI - Class in arena.core
The PlayerAI class represents the base class for all artificial intelligence agents for the Battle Arena game.
